verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Draw near to me
For I have drawn near to you
Pull on the strings of my heart
For I long to respond to you

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
All my love is for you
And all my love is yours

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
I've made a place for you here
So come on, come on
All things are possible here
So come on, come on
